Name: Buttercup
Notes: One of Flower 's daughters in the 1940s Disney comic book adaptation of the book by the same name

Name: Croque-Monsieur
Notes: The major antagonist of the series , who roams the woods with a carving knife

Name: Les Croquillards
Notes: The Croquillards are a ferret and stone marten who act as cronies to Anthracite the rat

Name: Fungo Squiggly
Notes: The ferret antagonist

Name: Geoffrey St. John
Notes: A skunk that served as an agent on the Royal Secret Service . He falls in love with Hershey and they marry during Sonic 's return to space . Eventually Geoffrey starts working alongside the Ixis Wizard , Naugus . Never existed in the rebooted retconned history of Mobius ( after # 252 )

Name: Gwenneth
Notes: One of twenty skunks , adopted children of antagonists R. L. and Angelique

Name: Hoeg
Notes: A small brown mustelid who accompanies the protagonist for much of the book

Name: Kiki
Notes: One of the main cast members

Name: Martin Marty Miller
Notes: He is the youngest of the six main characters and is introduced to the others at the beginning of the story . He becomes Taye 's boyfriend and is also an audience surrogate

Name: Basil MacTabolism
Notes: A polecat who is a door-to-door politician

Name: Miss Mam'selle Hepzibah
Notes: Originally Porky Pine 's love interest ; typically kept a French ( ish ) accent distinct from the others '

Name: Primrose
Notes: One of Flower 's daughters in the 1940s Disney comic book adaptation of the book by the same name

Name: Rappy
Notes: Protagonist of the Web comic Rappy the River Otter

Name: Rough
Notes: He is an evil mercenary and he is the brother of his partner , Tumble

Name: Sabrina
Notes: Protagonist of Eric Schwartz 's web comic , Sabrina Online

Name: Sissi Skunk
Notes: An entrepreneur and magnate from the webcomic by Karl Kerschl

Name: Torpile
Notes: Good friend of Chlorophylle

Name: Tumble
Notes: He is an evil mercenary and he is the brother of his partner , Rough

Name: Weather Weasel
Notes: Weasel version of Weather Wizard

Name: Weekly
Notes: Rumoured to only change his underwear once a week , hence his nickname
